nodes.text: Kevin-John is an official Disney Master Artist for The Walt Disney Company, where he has created theme park exclusive artwork for the Art of Disney Galleries and gift shops at the Walt Disney World Resort and Disneyland Resort. Since 1987, he has produced fine art for top athletes, celebrities, pro sports teams and corporations in the US. In 2018, he was commisioned by Lucasfilm to create fine art based on the Star Wars film series. His Star Wars artwork has been showcased in Topps Star Wars: Card Trader.
